roadmap.title: Master Programming Fundamentals
roadmap.description: Learn a language like Python or Java, focusing on variables, loops, functions, and object-oriented programming to build a foundation for solving computing problems.

roadmap.title: Understand Computer Science Basics
roadmap.description: Study discrete mathematics, computer architecture, and operating systems to grasp the theoretical foundations of computing.

roadmap.title: Learn Data Structures and Algorithms
roadmap.description: Master arrays, linked lists, stacks, queues, trees, and algorithms like sorting and searching to solve complex problems efficiently.

roadmap.title: Build Small Projects
roadmap.description: Apply your skills by creating projects like a to-do list app or a simple website to practice problem analysis and solution design.

roadmap.title: Learn Version Control with Git
roadmap.description: Understand Git and GitHub for version control, collaboration, and managing codebases effectively in team settings.

roadmap.title: Explore a Specialization
roadmap.description: Choose a focus area like web development or backend systems, and learn frameworks such as React or Spring Boot to design solutions.

roadmap.title: Understand Information Security
roadmap.description: Learn about software security, including secure coding practices and information security issues, to ensure ethical and safe software design.

roadmap.title: Work on Team Projects
roadmap.description: Collaborate on open-source projects or group assignments to enhance teamwork and communication skills in multidisciplinary settings.

roadmap.title: Build a Professional Portfolio
roadmap.description: Create a portfolio showcasing your projects, highlighting your ability to design and develop computing solutions.

roadmap.title: Prepare for Jobs and Continuous Learning
roadmap.description: Apply for entry-level roles or internships, and commit to life-long learning by staying updated with new tools and technologies.

roadmap.title: Learn Design Fundamentals
roadmap.description: Understand color theory, typography, and layout principles to build a foundation for creating visual solutions.
resources: Book: 'The Non-Designerâ€™s Design Book' by Robin Williams

roadmap.title: Master Design Software
roadmap.description: Learn modern tools like Adobe Photoshop, Illustrator, and Figma to create digital designs effectively.

roadmap.title: Study User Experience (UX) Basics
roadmap.description: Learn UX principles to design user-centered visuals, aligning with IT skills for integrating solutions into user environments.

roadmap.title: Create Sample Designs
roadmap.description: Design logos, posters, or UI mockups to practice applying design principles and tools.

roadmap.title: Learn Web Design Basics
roadmap.description: Understand HTML, CSS, and responsive design to create web-based visual solutions, aligning with BSIT web development skills.

roadmap.title: Explore Design Ethics
roadmap.description: Learn about ethical design practices, such as accessibility and inclusivity, to align with BSIT social responsibility outcomes.

roadmap.title: Collaborate on Design Projects
roadmap.description: Work with others to receive feedback and improve your designs, enhancing teamwork and communication skills.

roadmap.title: Build a Portfolio
roadmap.description: Compile your best work into a portfolio to showcase your ability to design visual solutions.

roadmap.title: Freelance or Intern
roadmap.description: Start freelancing or apply for internships to gain practical experience and apply IT-based design solutions.

roadmap.title: Engage in Continuous Learning
roadmap.description: Stay updated with design trends and tools, committing to life-long learning to remain competitive.

roadmap.title: Learn Programming and Statistics
roadmap.description: Master Python (NumPy, Pandas) and statistics (probability, hypothesis testing) to analyze data and solve problems.

roadmap.title: Understand Data Manipulation
roadmap.description: Learn SQL and data wrangling with Pandas to clean and prepare data for analysis.

roadmap.title: Master Machine Learning Basics
roadmap.description: Study regression, classification, and clustering using scikit-learn to build predictive models.
resources: Coursera Machine Learning by Andrew Ng (https://www.coursera.org/learn/machine-learning)

roadmap.title: Learn Data Visualization
roadmap.description: Use tools like Matplotlib, Seaborn, and Tableau to create visualizations and communicate insights effectively.

roadmap.title: Work on Data Projects
roadmap.description: Analyze datasets like the Titanic dataset on Kaggle to practice problem analysis and solution design.

roadmap.title: Explore Big Data Tools
roadmap.description: Learn tools like Apache Spark and Hadoop for handling large datasets, aligning with modern tool usage.

roadmap.title: Understand Data Privacy and Ethics
roadmap.description: Learn about data privacy laws and ethical data usage to ensure responsible data science practices.

roadmap.title: Collaborate on Data Projects
roadmap.description: Work with peers on Kaggle competitions or open-source projects to enhance teamwork and communication skills.

roadmap.title: Build a Data Science Portfolio
roadmap.description: Showcase your projects on GitHub, highlighting your ability to analyze and model data for real-world problems.

roadmap.title: Apply for Roles and Continue Learning
roadmap.description: Apply for data scientist roles and commit to life-long learning by staying updated with AI and data science trends.
resources: roadmap.sh AI and Data Scientist Roadmap (https://roadmap.sh/ai-data-scientist)

roadmap.title: Learn Software Testing Fundamentals
roadmap.description: Understand testing types (manual, automated, unit, integration) and quality assurance principles.

roadmap.title: Master Testing Tools
roadmap.description: Learn tools like Selenium, JUnit, and Postman for automated, unit, and API testing to utilize modern tools effectively.

roadmap.title: Practice Writing Test Cases
roadmap.description: Create test cases for sample applications, focusing on edge cases and risk-based testing.

roadmap.title: Learn Version Control
roadmap.description: Understand Git for version control to collaborate on testing projects and manage test scripts.

roadmap.title: Understand Software Security Basics
roadmap.description: Learn security testing basics, such as OWASP Top 10, to ensure software reliability and ethical practices.

roadmap.title: Explore Advanced Testing Techniques
roadmap.description: Study performance testing, load testing, and regression testing to ensure comprehensive quality assurance.

roadmap.title: Collaborate on Testing Projects
roadmap.description: Work with developers and testers on projects to improve teamwork and communication skills.

roadmap.title: Get Certified
roadmap.description: Obtain a certification like ISTQB Foundation Level to validate your testing skills and boost credibility.

roadmap.title: Build a QA Portfolio
roadmap.description: Document your test cases, automation scripts, and projects in a portfolio to showcase your skills.

roadmap.title: Apply for QA Roles and Continue Learning
roadmap.description: Apply for QA roles and engage in life-long learning to stay updated with testing trends and tools.

roadmap.title: Learn HTML & CSS Fundamentals
roadmap.description: Master HTML structure, semantic elements, CSS styling, layouts, and responsive design principles.

roadmap.title: Master JavaScript Fundamentals
roadmap.description: Learn JavaScript syntax, DOM manipulation, event handling, and ES6+ features for interactive web development.

roadmap.title: Learn Version Control with Git
roadmap.description: Understand Git workflows, GitHub collaboration, and version control best practices for web projects.

roadmap.title: Build Static Web Projects
roadmap.description: Create responsive websites, landing pages, and portfolios using HTML, CSS, and vanilla JavaScript.

roadmap.title: Learn a Frontend Framework
roadmap.description: Master React, Vue, or Angular to build dynamic single-page applications and component-based UIs.

roadmap.title: Understand Backend Basics
roadmap.description: Learn Node.js, Express, and RESTful APIs to build full-stack web applications.

roadmap.title: Learn Database Integration
roadmap.description: Work with databases like MongoDB or PostgreSQL to store and manage application data.

roadmap.title: Master Web Development Tools
roadmap.description: Learn build tools, bundlers, testing frameworks, and deployment strategies for professional development.

roadmap.title: Build Full-Stack Projects
roadmap.description: Create complete web applications with authentication, databases, and modern deployment practices.

roadmap.title: Apply for Web Developer Roles
roadmap.description: Build a professional portfolio, practice technical interviews, and apply for web development positions.

roadmap.title: Master HTML & CSS Advanced Concepts
roadmap.description: Learn semantic HTML, CSS Grid, Flexbox, animations, and modern CSS features for professional layouts.

roadmap.title: Advanced JavaScript & ES6+
roadmap.description: Master modern JavaScript features, async/await, modules, and advanced programming concepts.
resources: You Don't Know JS Book Series (https://github.com/getify/You-Dont-Know-JS)

roadmap.title: Learn React or Vue.js
roadmap.description: Master component-based development, state management, and modern frontend framework patterns.

roadmap.title: State Management & Advanced Patterns
roadmap.description: Learn Redux, Context API, or Vuex for complex state management and application architecture.

roadmap.title: Build Tools & Module Bundlers
roadmap.description: Master Webpack, Vite, or Parcel for optimizing and bundling frontend applications.

roadmap.title: Testing Frontend Applications
roadmap.description: Learn Jest, React Testing Library, and end-to-end testing with Cypress or Playwright.

roadmap.title: Performance Optimization
roadmap.description: Learn code splitting, lazy loading, performance monitoring, and web vitals optimization.

roadmap.title: Mobile-First & Accessibility
roadmap.description: Master responsive design, progressive web apps, and web accessibility standards (WCAG).

roadmap.title: Advanced Frontend Projects
roadmap.description: Build complex SPAs, component libraries, and contribute to open-source frontend projects.

roadmap.title: Career Development & Specialization
roadmap.description: Build a standout portfolio, contribute to tech communities, and specialize in areas like design systems.

roadmap.title: Learn Programming Language Fundamentals
roadmap.description: Master Python, Node.js, Java, or C# for server-side development with focus on backend patterns.

roadmap.title: Understand Databases & SQL
roadmap.description: Learn relational databases (PostgreSQL, MySQL) and SQL for data modeling and querying.

roadmap.title: Master Web Frameworks
roadmap.description: Learn backend frameworks like Express.js, FastAPI, Spring Boot, or ASP.NET for building APIs.

roadmap.title: API Design & RESTful Services
roadmap.description: Master REST API design, HTTP methods, status codes, and API documentation with OpenAPI/Swagger.

roadmap.title: Authentication & Security
roadmap.description: Implement JWT authentication, OAuth, password hashing, and security best practices.

roadmap.title: Database Design & ORM
roadmap.description: Learn database normalization, indexing, and Object-Relational Mapping tools like Sequelize or SQLAlchemy.

roadmap.title: Caching & Performance
roadmap.description: Implement caching strategies with Redis, database optimization, and application performance monitoring.

roadmap.title: Testing & Quality Assurance
roadmap.description: Learn unit testing, integration testing, and test-driven development for backend applications.

roadmap.title: Deployment & DevOps Basics
roadmap.description: Learn containerization with Docker, cloud deployment (AWS/GCP), and CI/CD pipelines.

roadmap.title: Advanced Backend Concepts
roadmap.description: Learn microservices, message queues, GraphQL, and system design for scalable applications.

roadmap.title: Choose Development Platform
roadmap.description: Decide between native (iOS/Android) or cross-platform (React Native, Flutter) development approach.

roadmap.title: Learn Programming Language
roadmap.description: Master Swift/Objective-C for iOS, Kotlin/Java for Android, or JavaScript/Dart for cross-platform.

roadmap.title: Mobile UI/UX Fundamentals
roadmap.description: Learn mobile design patterns, navigation, touch interactions, and platform-specific guidelines.

roadmap.title: Development Environment Setup
roadmap.description: Set up IDEs (Xcode, Android Studio, VS Code), emulators, and development tools for mobile apps.

roadmap.title: Build Basic Mobile Apps
roadmap.description: Create simple apps with navigation, forms, lists, and basic functionality to practice fundamentals.

roadmap.title: State Management & Data Storage
roadmap.description: Learn state management patterns and local data storage (SQLite, Core Data, Realm).

roadmap.title: API Integration & Networking
roadmap.description: Connect apps to web services, handle HTTP requests, and implement real-time features.

roadmap.title: Device Features & Native APIs
roadmap.description: Access camera, GPS, push notifications, sensors, and other device-specific features.

roadmap.title: Testing & Debugging
roadmap.description: Learn unit testing, integration testing, and debugging techniques for mobile applications.

roadmap.title: App Store Deployment
roadmap.description: Learn app store guidelines, build processes, and deployment to iOS App Store and Google Play.

roadmap.title: Design Fundamentals
roadmap.description: Learn color theory, typography, layout principles, visual hierarchy, and basic design concepts.

roadmap.title: User Experience Principles
roadmap.description: Understand user-centered design, usability principles, and human-computer interaction concepts.
resources: Don't Make Me Think by Steve Krug

roadmap.title: Design Tools Mastery
roadmap.description: Master Figma, Sketch, or Adobe XD for creating wireframes, mockups, and interactive prototypes.

roadmap.title: User Research Methods
roadmap.description: Learn user interviews, surveys, usability testing, and other research methods for understanding users.

roadmap.title: Information Architecture
roadmap.description: Learn to organize content, create user flows, site maps, and navigation structures.

roadmap.title: Wireframing & Prototyping
roadmap.description: Create low-fidelity wireframes and high-fidelity interactive prototypes for user testing.

roadmap.title: Responsive & Mobile Design
roadmap.description: Design for multiple screen sizes, mobile-first approach, and touch interfaces.

roadmap.title: Accessibility & Inclusive Design
roadmap.description: Learn WCAG guidelines, inclusive design principles, and designing for users with disabilities.

roadmap.title: Design Systems & Style Guides
roadmap.description: Create consistent design systems, component libraries, and maintain design documentation.

roadmap.title: Portfolio & Career Development
roadmap.description: Build a strong UX/UI portfolio, case studies, and prepare for design interviews.

roadmap.title: Mathematics & Statistics Foundation
roadmap.description: Master linear algebra, calculus, probability, and statistics essential for machine learning algorithms.

roadmap.title: Python Programming for ML
roadmap.description: Learn Python with focus on NumPy, Pandas, Matplotlib for data manipulation and analysis.

roadmap.title: Machine Learning Fundamentals
roadmap.description: Understand supervised/unsupervised learning, regression, classification, and clustering algorithms.
resources: Machine Learning Course by Andrew Ng (https://www.coursera.org/learn/machine-learning)

roadmap.title: Deep Learning & Neural Networks
roadmap.description: Learn neural networks, backpropagation, and deep learning frameworks like TensorFlow or PyTorch.

roadmap.title: Data Engineering & MLOps
roadmap.description: Learn data pipelines, model deployment, version control for ML, and production systems.

roadmap.title: Specialized ML Domains
roadmap.description: Choose specialization: Computer Vision, NLP, Reinforcement Learning, or Time Series Analysis.

roadmap.title: Cloud ML Platforms
roadmap.description: Learn cloud ML services like AWS SageMaker, Google AI Platform, or Azure ML Studio.

roadmap.title: Model Optimization & Scaling
roadmap.description: Learn model compression, quantization, distributed training, and performance optimization.

roadmap.title: ML System Design
roadmap.description: Design end-to-end ML systems, handle data at scale, and understand system architecture patterns.
resources: Designing ML Systems Book by Chip Huyen

roadmap.title: Industry Projects & Deployment
roadmap.description: Build complete ML projects, contribute to open source, and deploy models in production environments.

roadmap.title: Database Fundamentals
roadmap.description: Learn relational database concepts, ACID properties, normalization, and database design principles.

roadmap.title: Master SQL
roadmap.description: Learn advanced SQL queries, joins, subqueries, stored procedures, and database programming.

roadmap.title: Database Administration
roadmap.description: Learn user management, security, backup/recovery, and database maintenance procedures.

roadmap.title: Performance Tuning
roadmap.description: Master query optimization, indexing strategies, and database performance monitoring.

roadmap.title: Backup & Recovery
roadmap.description: Implement backup strategies, disaster recovery plans, and high availability solutions.

roadmap.title: Database Security
roadmap.description: Learn authentication, authorization, encryption, and security best practices for databases.

roadmap.title: Cloud Database Services
roadmap.description: Work with cloud databases like AWS RDS, Google Cloud SQL, and Azure Database services.

roadmap.title: NoSQL Databases
roadmap.description: Learn MongoDB, Cassandra, or Redis for non-relational data management needs.

roadmap.title: Automation & Scripting
roadmap.description: Automate database tasks using scripting languages and database automation tools.

roadmap.title: Professional Certification
roadmap.description: Obtain database certifications and build expertise in specific database platforms.

roadmap.title: Operating Systems Fundamentals
roadmap.description: Master Linux/Unix and Windows Server administration, command line interfaces, and system architecture.

roadmap.title: Networking & Security
roadmap.description: Learn TCP/IP, DNS, DHCP, firewalls, VPNs, and network security fundamentals.

roadmap.title: Virtualization & Containers
roadmap.description: Master VMware, Hyper-V, Docker, and container orchestration with Kubernetes.

roadmap.title: Cloud Platforms
roadmap.description: Learn AWS, Azure, or Google Cloud Platform for cloud infrastructure management.

roadmap.title: Scripting & Automation
roadmap.description: Master PowerShell, Bash, Python for automating system administration tasks.

roadmap.title: Monitoring & Performance
roadmap.description: Implement system monitoring, log analysis, and performance optimization strategies.

roadmap.title: Backup & Disaster Recovery
roadmap.description: Design and implement backup strategies, disaster recovery plans, and business continuity.

roadmap.title: Configuration Management
roadmap.description: Learn Ansible, Puppet, or Chef for infrastructure as code and configuration management.

roadmap.title: Security & Compliance
roadmap.description: Implement security policies, compliance frameworks, and incident response procedures.

roadmap.title: Advanced Specializations
roadmap.description: Specialize in areas like DevOps, cloud architecture, or security administration.

roadmap.title: Business Analysis Fundamentals
roadmap.description: Learn business process analysis, requirements gathering, and stakeholder management techniques.

roadmap.title: Systems Analysis & Design
roadmap.description: Master system development lifecycle, UML modeling, and system architecture principles.

roadmap.title: Database & Data Analysis
roadmap.description: Learn SQL, data modeling, and data analysis techniques for business intelligence.

roadmap.title: Project Management
roadmap.description: Understand project management methodologies, Agile, Scrum, and project planning tools.

roadmap.title: Technology Stack Understanding
roadmap.description: Gain technical knowledge of programming languages, frameworks, and enterprise systems.

roadmap.title: Process Improvement
roadmap.description: Learn Lean, Six Sigma, and process optimization methodologies for business efficiency.

roadmap.title: Documentation & Communication
roadmap.description: Master technical writing, documentation standards, and presentation skills.

roadmap.title: Cloud & Digital Transformation
roadmap.description: Understand cloud computing, digital transformation strategies, and modern IT architecture.

roadmap.title: Industry Specialization
roadmap.description: Develop expertise in specific industries like healthcare, finance, or manufacturing.

roadmap.title: Leadership & Strategy
roadmap.description: Develop leadership skills and strategic thinking for senior analyst roles.

roadmap.title: Game Development Fundamentals
roadmap.description: Learn game design principles, game loops, player psychology, and basic game mechanics.
resources: Game Design Workshop by Tracy Fullerton

roadmap.title: Programming Language for Games
roadmap.description: Master C# (Unity), C++ (Unreal), or JavaScript for game development fundamentals.

roadmap.title: Game Engine Mastery
roadmap.description: Learn Unity, Unreal Engine, or Godot for creating 2D and 3D games efficiently.

roadmap.title: Mathematics for Games
roadmap.description: Master vectors, matrices, trigonometry, and physics concepts essential for game programming.

roadmap.title: Graphics & Animation
roadmap.description: Learn 2D/3D graphics programming, shaders, animation systems, and visual effects.

roadmap.title: Game Physics & AI
roadmap.description: Implement physics systems, collision detection, pathfinding, and AI behavior systems.

roadmap.title: Audio & Sound Design
roadmap.description: Integrate audio systems, sound effects, music, and spatial audio in games.

roadmap.title: Multiplayer & Networking
roadmap.description: Learn networking concepts, client-server architecture, and multiplayer game development.
resources: Multiplayer Game Programming by Joshua Glazer

roadmap.title: Game Optimization & Performance
roadmap.description: Optimize games for different platforms, profile performance, and manage memory efficiently.

roadmap.title: Publishing & Portfolio
roadmap.description: Learn game publishing, marketing, platform requirements, and build a strong portfolio.

roadmap.title: Linux & Command Line Mastery
roadmap.description: Master Linux administration, shell scripting, and command-line tools for system management.

roadmap.title: Version Control & Git
roadmap.description: Learn advanced Git workflows, branching strategies, and collaborative development practices.

roadmap.title: Containerization & Docker
roadmap.description: Master Docker containers, image creation, multi-stage builds, and container orchestration basics.
resources: Docker Deep Dive by Nigel Poulton

roadmap.title: Kubernetes & Orchestration
roadmap.description: Learn Kubernetes clusters, deployments, services, and container orchestration at scale.

roadmap.title: Infrastructure as Code
roadmap.description: Master Terraform, CloudFormation, or Pulumi for automated infrastructure provisioning.
resources: Infrastructure as Code Patterns and Practices by Rosemary Wang

roadmap.title: CI/CD Pipelines
roadmap.description: Build automated deployment pipelines with Jenkins, GitLab CI, GitHub Actions, or Azure DevOps.

roadmap.title: Cloud Platforms
roadmap.description: Master AWS, Azure, or Google Cloud Platform services and cloud-native architectures.

roadmap.title: Monitoring & Observability
roadmap.description: Implement monitoring, logging, and alerting with Prometheus, Grafana, ELK stack, or similar tools.

roadmap.title: Security & Compliance
roadmap.description: Learn DevSecOps practices, security scanning, compliance automation, and security best practices.

roadmap.title: Advanced DevOps Practices
roadmap.description: Master GitOps, service mesh, chaos engineering, and site reliability engineering (SRE).
resources: Site Reliability Engineering Book by Google

roadmap.title: Business Intelligence Fundamentals
roadmap.description: Learn BI concepts, data warehousing, ETL processes, and business analytics principles.
resources: The Data Warehouse Toolkit by Ralph Kimball

roadmap.title: SQL & Database Skills
roadmap.description: Master advanced SQL queries, window functions, and database optimization for analytics.

roadmap.title: Data Visualization Tools
roadmap.description: Learn Tableau, Power BI, or Qlik Sense for creating interactive dashboards and reports.

roadmap.title: Statistical Analysis
roadmap.description: Understand descriptive statistics, hypothesis testing, and statistical methods for business insights.

roadmap.title: Data Modeling & Warehousing
roadmap.description: Learn dimensional modeling, star schemas, and data warehouse design patterns.
resources: Data Modeling Essentials by Graeme Simsion

roadmap.title: ETL & Data Integration
roadmap.description: Master ETL tools like SSIS, Talend, or Informatica for data extraction and transformation.

roadmap.title: Business Requirements Analysis
roadmap.description: Learn to gather business requirements, define KPIs, and translate business needs into technical solutions.

roadmap.title: Advanced Analytics & Machine Learning
roadmap.description: Explore predictive analytics, data mining, and basic machine learning for business insights.

roadmap.title: Cloud BI Platforms
roadmap.description: Learn cloud-based BI solutions like AWS QuickSight, Google Data Studio, or Azure Analytics.

roadmap.title: Industry Specialization & Leadership
roadmap.description: Develop domain expertise in specific industries and leadership skills for senior BI roles.

roadmap.title: Software Testing Fundamentals
roadmap.description: Learn testing principles, types of testing, test levels, and quality assurance concepts.

roadmap.title: Manual Testing Techniques
roadmap.description: Master test case design, boundary value analysis, equivalence partitioning, and exploratory testing.

roadmap.title: Test Management Tools
roadmap.description: Learn test management tools like Jira, TestRail, or Azure DevOps for test planning and execution.

roadmap.title: API Testing
roadmap.description: Learn REST API testing using Postman, REST Assured, or similar tools for backend testing.

roadmap.title: Automation Testing Basics
roadmap.description: Learn programming fundamentals and basic automation concepts with Python or Java.

roadmap.title: Web Automation Testing
roadmap.description: Master Selenium WebDriver for automated web application testing across browsers.

roadmap.title: Mobile Testing
roadmap.description: Learn mobile testing techniques and tools like Appium for iOS and Android applications.

roadmap.title: Performance Testing
roadmap.description: Learn performance testing concepts and tools like JMeter or LoadRunner for load testing.

roadmap.title: CI/CD & DevOps Integration
roadmap.description: Integrate testing into CI/CD pipelines and learn DevOps practices for continuous testing.

roadmap.title: Specialized Testing & Career Growth
roadmap.description: Specialize in security testing, accessibility testing, or test leadership roles.

roadmap.title: Cybersecurity Fundamentals
roadmap.description: Learn the core principles of cybersecurity including CIA triad (Confidentiality, Integrity, Availability), threat modeling, and basic security concepts.

roadmap.title: Network Security Basics
roadmap.description: Understand network protocols, firewalls, intrusion detection systems, and VPNs to secure network infrastructure.

roadmap.title: Operating System Security
roadmap.description: Master Windows and Linux security, including access controls, user management, and system hardening techniques.

roadmap.title: Ethical Hacking & Penetration Testing
roadmap.description: Learn ethical hacking techniques, vulnerability assessment, and penetration testing methodologies to identify security weaknesses.

roadmap.title: Incident Response & Forensics
roadmap.description: Develop skills in digital forensics, incident response procedures, and malware analysis to handle security breaches effectively.
resources: SANS Digital Forensics and Incident Response (https://www.sans.org/cyber-security-courses/digital-forensics-incident-response)

roadmap.title: Security Risk Assessment
roadmap.description: Learn risk management frameworks, compliance standards (ISO 27001, NIST), and how to conduct security audits.

roadmap.title: Cloud Security
roadmap.description: Master cloud security concepts, AWS/Azure security services, and secure cloud architecture design patterns.

roadmap.title: Application Security
roadmap.description: Learn secure coding practices, web application security testing, and how to identify common vulnerabilities like OWASP Top 10.

roadmap.title: Security Operations Center (SOC)
roadmap.description: Gain experience with SIEM tools, log analysis, threat hunting, and security monitoring to operate in a SOC environment.

roadmap.title: Advanced Certifications & Specialization
roadmap.description: Pursue advanced certifications like CISSP, CISM, or specialize in areas like IoT security, AI security, or security architecture.
